name: The Midas Touch
overview: The Midas Touch is a 1 - 2 player phrasal guessing game for the 8-but Atari computer Two human players can compete, or the player competes against themselves. The player takes turns spinning a wheel that has numerous stones and other valuable material written it, and the value of the material corresponds to the score the player receives for each correct letter guessed. Vowels must be purchased. The first player to guess the entire phrase wins points for the round.
